question: What is the theme of the ‘National Ayurveda Day 2020’?
explanation:
National Ayurveda Day is celebrated on the same day of Dhanwantri Jayanti since 2016. This year it was celebrated on November 13.
National Ayurveda Day was celebrated across the country on the theme of 'Ayurveda for Covid-19'. The day is observed to spread awareness on the importance of Ayurveda in our daily lives.
